name: CLP_VALUE_DATA
description: This table extracts the value codes and value amounts printed on institutional claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim print record.

columns.name: VALUE_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores Value Code to print on institutional claims

columns.name: VALUE_AMT
columns.description: Value Remark to print on institutional claims
